Tests that multiple cannot emulate simultaneously.
Emulating in 1
{
    id : <messageId>
    result : {
    }
}
session1.canEmulate: true
session2.canEmulate: false
Emulating in 2
{
    error : {
        code : -32000
        message : Another client is emulating
    }
    id : <messageId>
}
session1.canEmulate: true
session2.canEmulate: false
Clearing in 1
{
    id : <messageId>
    result : {
    }
}
session1.canEmulate: true
session2.canEmulate: true
Emulating in 2
{
    id : <messageId>
    result : {
    }
}
session1.canEmulate: false
session2.canEmulate: true
Emulating in 1
{
    error : {
        code : -32000
        message : Another client is emulating
    }
    id : <messageId>
}
session1.canEmulate: false
session2.canEmulate: true
Clearing in 2
{
    id : <messageId>
    result : {
    }
}
session1.canEmulate: true
session2.canEmulate: true
